title: Destined
description: Do you believe in soul mates? That there is one person out there who you’re supposed to meet and fall in love with? One person who completes you? My name is Miley and I do because I found mine. I’ve never been the kind of girl who needed a man to feel complete, until I met Jonathan. Now I can’t bear to spend a night away from him. Let me tell you our story - the most beautiful love story even if I do say so myself. You’ll fall head over heels for my man, I know you will. Come and meet Mr Cooper.Book five in The Connected Series.
author: K.A. Hobbs
